haw.livingplace.scriptSimulator.script

Class Script

  • java.lang.Object
    • haw.livingplace.scriptSimulator.script.Script
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scriptable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Scriptable>, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Script
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scriptable
    The Script class contains a list of ScriptEntrys
    Author:
    Andreas Basener
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • add

        public void add(Scriptable entry)
        Adds a new ScriptEntry to the entryList and reorders the list.
        Parameters:

      • remove

        public void remove(Scriptable entry)
        Removes the passed Scriptable from the entryList.
        Parameters:
        entry - the Scriptable to be removed

      • playScript

        public void playScript()
        Plays the Script
        Starts a new Thread for every ScriptEntry in the entryList. Waits the specified offset in milliseconds until the ScriptEntry starts.
        playScript() doesn't wait for the ScriptEntrys to terminate.

      • getEntryList

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Scriptable o)
        Defines how the Script is ordered in a List.
        If the offset is smaller than the passed Scriptable this Script is considered greater.
        If the offset is equal than the passed Scriptable this Script is considered smaller.
        Else this Script is equal to to passed Scriptable.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Scriptable>
